content.en: Intelligent Adaptive Agents: Researchers have explored various aspects of intelligent adaptive agents, including their roles, characteristics, and specifications. They have also focused on the design and effective operation of multiagent systems, as well as the consolidation of work through large-scale applications and integration with theoretical foundations in agent-based systems. Additionally, they have investigated the application of artificial intelligence techniques to telecommunications and the development of intelligent software for various applications using autonomous agents.
content.da: Intelligente Adaptative Agenter: Forskere har udforsket forskellige aspekter af intelligente adaptive agenter, herunder deres roller, karakteristika og specifikationer. De har også fokuseret på design og effektiv drift af multiagentsystemer samt konsolidering af arbejde gennem storskala-applikationer og integration med teoretiske fundamenter i agentbaserede systemer. Derudover har de undersøgt anvendelsen af kunstig intelligens teknikker til telekommunikation og udvikling af intelligent software til forskellige applikationer ved hjælp af autonome agenter.
